reviewText: The host, Andrea, is funny and engaging. She is a joy to watch. The food is simple and looks delicious. However, if your looking for a demo of HOW to chop, dice, julienne etc. You will not find it here. All of the ingredients are in bowls already and you watch Andrea literally put them into pots, or a blender or food processor.  Also, these are not complete meals, nor are there any menu suggestions given.
This is a great introduction for people who are new to cooking, or anyone looking to get healthy. Nice holiday gift idea!

This DVD is fantastic! As a private chef, it's an invaluable resource for fine-tuning my skills and new recipe inspiration. Andrea is an absolute joy to watch - SO much fun, and I learned so much from her. As a health coach, I recommend this DVD to all my clients - experienced cooks and novices alike.

I really enjoyed this DVD. The recipe's were all so simple yet so healthy and delicious! Plus, Andrea Beaman is so relatable, it really made me feel like I could make any of these dishes at home - and I did! I would definitely recommend this.
What a great DVD! Love the idea of using it as a client giveaway, but I don't want to give up my copy! =) I will be ordering a few more for holiday gifts and giveaways.

I'm always looking for ways to spice up my healthy cooking routine.  This DVD provides simple ways to do that and make it fun.  As a graduate of IIN, I also love having this DVD as a resource because it makes a great gift and giveaway for my clients.  They love it!

This DVD was awesome! It taught me how to make so many amazing and healthy meals that I know I will never get tired of. Andrea Beaman made the recipes so simple that I have been able to start to adding my own flare to them creating even more complex dishes. The steps were really easy to follow and everything tasted great!
